unlock.description: Infest a human's body with an invasive fungus that eliminates most bacteria. Only works in torment vessels.
Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation uses electrical impulses to stimulate muscles. For patients in a coma-like state, this keeps them fit and with full range of motion when they emerge.

A Sequential Compression Device is a mechanism that applies intermittent pressure to the legs and other extremities. For patients in a coma-like state, this drastically reduces the risk of deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism, and maintains proper circulation.
